item.title: Senior Software QA Engineer - Contract Position (mill valley)
item.description:
The engineering group is seeking a Senior Software Quality Assurance Engineer to design and execute test programs to verify the functionality of TVWorks interactive television software products and applications. The Senior SQA Engineer will design and write clear test plans, configure test environments, and write and execute test cases in a timely manner while tracking and communicating bug statistics. The candidate will serve as a technical leader to other testers in the execution of the test plan. The candidate should be a flexible, independent worker as well as an excellent team player and able to work optimally under schedule deadlines and with the product team's passion for quality and delivery.

This is a contract position planned for a 9 month project.

DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES
 Provide technical leadership to a team of software testers involved in the production of set-top software for interactive television.
 Design and develop improvements to the test tools and methodologies used by the test team.
 Interface with internal groups, and to a more limited degree, customers and partners.
 Serve as technical lead, mentor team members, providing code level feedback as needed.
 Setup and configure test environments (set top boxes, simulators, web servers, etc.)
 Develop, document, and execute detailed test cases and test suites (build acceptance, functional, integration, stress, load, performance, etc.). Test development may include XML programming and shell scripting.
 Monitor, track and regularly report test status and bug statistics to the project team.

KNOWLEDGE/EXPERIENCE/EDUCATION REQUIRED
 White box testing experience required.
 +5 years of software testing experience.
 +2 years of programming experience in Java, JavaScript, DHTML, XML and Perl.
 Experience in a technical leadership position
 Excellent organizational, interpersonal and communication skills.
 Proven ability to troubleshoot and debug running software
 Strong understanding of user interface fundamentals and appreciation for user experience.

KNOWLEDGE/EXPERIENCE/EDUCATION DESIRED
 Experience testing applications for cable set-tops and the TV viewing experience.
 Experience working with a distributed team, or teams.
 BS or higher degree in Computer Science, or equivalent experience.
 Experience working in an Agile development environment.
 Must be detail-oriented, pro-active, and able to prioritize and juggle multiple projects simultaneously.
